_sText: It goes in your maps folder.
Uhh, it goes in your maps folder. If you're a server owner and you host this map and want your server IP listed, just ask and I'll add it here.

Surf_mental

Semi skill map/race map.

after beating the levels as soon as you can go to the awp (top jail) and hit the "jail" button this will put everyone in jail with a knife. (only those who were surfing and didnt had a weapon already)

map is tested on sv_airaccelerate 200 sv_accelerate 5/10 both work.

if no one made awp and there are afkers there is a teleport timer wich will teleport everyone to jail after 3 minutes playtime.

as i said it's a race map first one at the end will most likely get the most kills.

map is quite easy but takes a bit skill around lvl 3 (mp5) to manouvre around the glass. (SS #3)

==-- THERE IS NO FALL DAMAGE --==

i did my best on the textures so please don't complain to much


if this map is a succes ill make a version with good lighting so don't complain about lighting yet!

My brand new T4 staged map. It consists of five stages and two additional bonus stages. 

While the main map is around T4 there are brief portions where the difficulty will dip significantly below and slightly higher than T4. The first additional bonus, created by Sagan, is intended to be approximately T3. The second additional bonus, created by Xtra_Festive, is intended to be approximately T5. 

This is my first ever published map that is reminiscent of older mapping styles and formatting. In my map I integrate small bhop portions to the surf to change things up a bit. I hope to expand on these new ideas and concepts moving forward in my next projects.

I would like to extend a HUGE thank you and shout out to all of my testers and friends that have answered each and every question and walked me through even the most basic concepts. I would like to especially thank Xtra for his many lessons and bits of feedback and Sagan for consistently motivating me to be the best I can be.

Thank you so much to anyone who plays this map! I hope you enjoy it as much as I do!

An Additional EXTRA thanks to Juxtapo who made the Showcase video as well!

Hey, this is an addictive map by myself and Cleavage from the Surfers-United clan. It's quite hard, especially the boost on the second platform, but easy to get used to. It's quite big, so you should be playing for a good while, but also it's very interesting as it has switches that can blow up people at spawn towards the end of the second room with a camera.

There is a grenade-arena as well with a 'crusher' switch which is very very cool, that crushes people behind the glass... as it's the only way to get to the weapons and out of the grenade arena (unless you're killed)

Have Fun!

- Steve

I'm going to copy and paste part of the readme. If want more info you can find it at forums.solidsurf.info 

This is a linear freestyle map with 1 bombsite.  You spawn with a knife only, and unless you can make it to the top of jail by surfing well, the only ways to get a gun is to put a watermelon in a miniature golf like hole.  There is 12+ scouts laying around in the map along with a few AWPs in hard to reach places.  If you find your self stuck in jail there is a jail break button at the top of the middle waterfall that opens jail.  There are a few other secrets hidden in the map to.

This is the third and (hopefully) final version of my debut surf map.
Basically it was an exercise for me to see what kind of detail fits certain settings,  as can be seen by the changing styles throughout the map.

Final!!
- Fixed teleporter at endzone not going anywhere.
- New spawn!!
- Fixed some lighting issues.
- Minor changes to the skybox.
- Lots more secrets, including two new mysterious controls in the top-of-jail area.

Beta 2!!

- Fixed problem getting out of smg area.
- Removed random spawns
- Removed ability to spawn jump
- Added nade spawners in jail
- Cubemaps now work
- One extra secret ;)

Enjoy :)

I finally got around to doing the next version of this map. Basically too many bug fixes and changes for me to possibly remember, the most significant of which being the fact that lighting is now enabled, with the file size being small enough to be dl'd from a server.
Very minor have been made to the actual course, most changes are regarding the end zone and jail.

Changes regarding the jail:
- Nades and flashes are now provided
- More open
- More secrets
- More controls ;D

The endzone has also been improved, and the auto-sniper section removed (or has it ;))
A version of surf_meister_v1 with no lighting so as to reduce the overall file size for the map. Making it possible to download from the server.

My latest surf map, features:

* Random jail spawns to reduce sticking and camping
* Randomly generated control-area pass.
* Separate Islands for each gun-type.

Enjoy :)
Enjoy, although its quite a hard map, took me time to get the gang of it.

this is the very first map i've made, and i'm only 13, so it's probably not the best.
But at least give me effort on it, since im only 13 and it is the first surf map i've ever made.

#### Hello there!
My name is Mr. Darkness, the creator of his own first surf map, even tho, experienced with Source entities and global mapping.
Today I am presenting you my map which was done not a long time ago for my community, even tho, wanted to share with it here.
------------------

Many people didn't know how to start playing this map, so I am teaching you now.
So how do you actually play it? Easy!

You start in one of the spawns (T and CT are blocked with 2 barriers and an invisible block bullet texture) and right in front of you there is a weapons menu. The Spotlight that is lighting up the weapon group means that the weapon group is enabled for use, even tho, you dont spawn with ammo. So watch for your ammo in the magazine.

After you choose your weapon you press the red button (on left side for CT, and right side for T), by that lights go on and a bullseye appears. You must destroy the bullseye with your team, so that a wall to the exit breaks and you can go out surfing.

Notice that only on the 2nd round you will be able to pick up newer weapons like Deagle, 5-7, elites and p228 + a random group of weapons (which are SMGs; 1 scout sniper; "M3 group" (M3, xm1014, Sg552, AUG)). The group with AWP will be unlocked by reaching the "awp temple", which appears to be at the house below the spawn.

If you get in jail, there are 5 houses, which have 1 button in each. Every button unlocks the Exit door, but after the button gets locked.

To unlock the buttons you must reach the top of the jail and press the green button on the rotating cross. The red button smashed the players with the roof if they are inside of one of the 5 houses. The 6th house is the exit house.

For first time you may not understand how to play the map, but it's quite easy after all. I already experienced on my own map. :')
------------------

If you may need a video to understand how to surf on the map, I made one already.
Go [here](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l_1qnv5UGtE "here.").

I hope you like the map. Thanks for your attention!
Till the new projects!

-Mr. Darkness

EDIT: If you click the video, then turn off the sound, please! :')

Surf_me, a map made so I can begin sentences with "Me is".

Me is a tier 1-2, 5 stage map with 4 bonuses.  

This map is easy to complete, but it has plenty of shortcuts to make it fun for more advanced surfers, too.

Bonus 1 is by Xtra, bonus 2 by malt, and bonuses 3 and 4 by me.

This map is intended to be played on 66 tick with 150 airaccelerate and 10000 maxvelocity

Download, install, play!

Play hard go pro!

Map made possibly by: www.mappercrew.de

Additions to this map include:

The map itself has barely changed at all besides the jail feature which, you can just walk out of.  I know that seems weird, but when you play it, I'm sure you will like it.

Surf_marble is probably one of the easiest surf maps you "pro's" will ever surf.  I've been informed that it is like surf_skyworld in a way, and people seem to like it.

It was a quick build and I built it mainly for nooby surfers.  :)  Anyway, that being completely irrelevant, you "pro's" out there will have a lot of fun with this map because there are a lot of things you can mess around with and do.

Enjoy.

Many different secrets in this map, I wanted to improve it, but for some reason, I can decompile every other map, BUT this map I made myself :\

Enjoy.

A map I have been working on since November. It features about 1m 40s of fun linear surf, one bonus, and a hard mode.

Players have 9 minutes to complete the map. If the timer expires they get sent to jail for a knife fight. If someone beats the map they get to kill the other team with an m249. The jail has 2 deagles in the center always up for grabs, so remember to watch out even if you won.

Link to the no jail versions is inside the archive.

Enjoy!

[Visit Intox](http://www.intoxgaming.com "http://www.intoxgaming.com")

Hey! I just made a remake of the map surf_mai_remix! I made a new design and added a few secrets! I deleted the bombplace and added a Disco xD I also made a Top. You can activate a jail laser. I hope u will find the secret buttons to get to the secret room. Tip: Every of the 4 secret buttons is above a weapon automat. After u activated all 4 secret buttons in the right order you have to surf trough the first teleport, but from the backside. In the secret room you can heal and there is a buyzone. To get to the jail laser room damage a button (you have to search for it xD) and then you have to open a door (both in labyrinth) Tip: look in the labyrinth Maybe u know the camperboxes in front of the scout, i added a button to destroy the camper boxes. I ran some alphas & betas on my server. Almost all people like the map! I hope u also will! You can try the map on my server: 85.25.145.112:27016 Much fun! Sorry for my bad English, i am from Austria Nice greetings AndYZ >>> Servers hosting surf_mai maps <<< Video:

This is a pro version of the surf_mai collection with a touch of surf_mai_remix and design inspiration of Buck Nastys maps. Please note that this is only a BETA and I know that there are some bugs in this map. I'm uploading this now as I wanted to finish this map in near future. For that I need some more testers, helping me to find bugs and improving my map. Any constructive feedback is welcome, excluding that the design is copied from BuckNasty. At this point I need to say that I've already talked to Buck Nasty about the design sheme and it's textures. He helped me finding a new collection (thanks for that) which I didn't use in this version yet . So don't worry, it's gonna be changed on further versions. Thanks to everyone who helped me with this map yet. +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Known Bugs: - On the big half-cicled ramp you get stack sometimes but mostely it will work fine. (Most annoying) - Some spotlights, spawning under water, have some strange lighting errors. - Sometimes you don't get a knife, if you fell down into jail. - You can walk in the middle of the spawn (the wall) tought there are 2 trigger_pushes in 2 different directions (like one to the left, one to the right, if you stand in the middle you won't be pushed anywhere). - In the middle of the map, on the round platform, the push sometimes doesn't push you far enough (to jail). +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ This is a fast map with all its boosters and fast weapon spawners without pressing buttons anymore. Also you don't need to wait for somebody to help you, if you fall to jail, anymore, as you can simply walk away - but without weapons. All ramps are smooth and can be surfed from both sides. Buyzone and "secret" shotgun are still included. The bomb-target activates itself after 60 seconds. Have fun with it and please post as much feedback as possible, whatever is in your mind. Cheers, Krusty

<font face=verdana size=3 color=red>THIS IS AN OUTDATED VERSION! Version TWO has been released!</font>

Surf_machine_remix by Paper-Cut

_________________________________________________


Installation: Drag folder into cstrike.

_________________________________________________


Permission to make this rebuild was received from Z-machine. 

_________________________________________________

Credits: 
Z-machine for the original map
Paper-Cut, remix version

_________________________________________________


Version 1 Changes:

Textures redone EVERYWHERE
Added jail release/kill mechanism
Fixed several various ramp problems
Added push out of spawn teleports to avoid camping
Propped guns against wall at top to avoid gun nading
Added 2 scouts at cone
Redid all the arches
Fixed several various texture glitches
Added shotguns near cone push
Extended the fence at spawn
Moved the awps on the middle ramp to a higher platform
Added a few secrets, :D
Fixed doors before the loop
Changed the loop a little to make it more smooth
Added environmental lighting
Redid the ramps to cone area
Redid the gun room to the far right
Added an anti-camping incentive near the T spawn teleport
Fixed the ramps at jail so they are now surfable both ways
Added teleport indicators

_________________________________________________


Big thanks goes out to:

Solid Surf, for your great community, tutorials, help and resources
Etrigan, for testing virtually every beta that I put out for this.
SintaxError, for providing me with various help, and with his invisible water texture
Aes, for showing me that surfing gods really do exist.

_________________________________________________


Happy surfing!

_sText:
<font face="verdana" size="1">Surf_machine_remix by Paper-Cut
_________________________________________________

Installation: Drag folder into cstrike.
_________________________________________________

Permission to make this rebuild was received from Z-machine. 
_________________________________________________

Credits: 
Z-machine for the original map
Paper-Cut, remix version
_________________________________________________

Please note that the screenshots are from version 2, **NOT** the finalized version.

**Finalized Version Notes:

Changes:

Few re-created ramp structures
Addition of telehop platforms, not as easy as they look
General fixes/remixes along the way**

_________________________________________________

Version 2 Changes:

* Optimized for 66tick *

Ramp coming out of spawn is now 16x smoother than original

Removed the skip blocker by request

Added additional platforms for the more skilled surfers

Replaced the bridge with tram system

Added surf near deagle platform, contains MP5 platform

Various bug fixes

Added bars at glass above spawn

Added push-out of the teleport at top, similar to those of spawn

Added push-out in TMP room, similar to those of spawn
Various texture changes

Redid some of the TMP/Mac10 room

Removed the water from the cone at top, exposing campers

Extended the platform above the T/CT/Top surf to help avoid spawn-rape
________________________________________________

Version 1 Changes:

Textures redone EVERYWHERE

Added jail release/kill mechanism

Fixed several various ramp problems

Added push out of spawn teleports to avoid camping

Propped guns against wall at top to avoid gun nading

Added 2 scouts at cone

Redid all the arches

Fixed several various texture glitches

Added shotguns near cone push

Extended the fence at spawn

Moved the awps on the middle ramp to a higher platform

Fixed doors before the loop

Changed the loop a little to make it more smooth

Added environmental lighting

Redid the ramps to cone area

Redid the gun room to the far right

Added an anti-camping incentive near the T spawn teleport

Fixed the ramps at jail so they are now surfable both ways

Added teleport indicators
_________________________________________________

Big thanks goes out to:

Z-Machine, for providing me with great suggestions, and for bug-testing, and for the original map which is still amazing to this day.
Solid Surf, for your great community, tutorials, help and resources.
Etrigan, for testing virtually every beta that I put out for this.
SintaxError, for providing me with various help, and for his invisible water texture.
Aes, for showing me that surfing gods really do exist.
_________________________________________________

Happy surfing!</font>

----------------------------------
surf_machine_reloaded
Created by Z-Machine
"Reloaded" by Assaulted_Combat
----------------------------------

This map is a refreshed version from surf_machine.
It contains many new features:
- Weapon spawners at top
- Trigger push at the top to prevent camping
- Double sided ramp (behind jail)
- Ammo strip (where the deagles are located)
- Spotlights
- Smoothed turning ramp (rebuilt from scratch)
- New skybox
- Map is lit

Before these changes were done, we had the approval to do so (via PM) from Z-Machine. So, please do not scold me or Assaulted_Combat. Z-Machine's name still remains in this map as it was with nothing more, nothing less.

--Assaulted_Combat
--Buck Nasty

http://forums.solidsurf.info/
